content: the cat squish is a cuddly calico kitty and a very squishy free crochet pattern on moogly featuring bernat blanket this pattern will sink its claws right into you - in the most delightful way i love using bernat blanket for my large amigurumi squishes and the cat squish is no exception for this one i used a standard skein of the white color and then grabbed an o go for the other colors which i needed just a bit of of course you can use leftover bits of whatever colors you like to create your own custom cat and any worsted or bulky weight yarn you have works great for the whisker and mouth details - but i think bernat maker home decrease is purr-fect this pattern is free on the blog or you can purchase the ad-free pdf https //www mooglyblog com/cat-squish/ https //www mooglyblog com/cat-squish/
